document.discussion_title: Rio 2016: The Best Photos From The Olympics | LBC
document.topic_text: > Rio 2016: The Best Photos From The Olympics Rio 2016: The Best Photos From The Olympics Monday 22nd August 2016 These are the best photos from the Rio Olympics as Team GB celebrated our best away Games ever.
